text: 4.6: Sng 91.11-12 naŋga, Jo 7.3-4Kamata Satan yahata Jisasɨŋ nɨmavami, Gotɨndu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ ambami, Got nuŋandɨ kutɨkara haŋɨnɨŋ sɨmbɨti pata kumandamata naŋ mɨŋahandata kavuta urɨmandɨyu. Kamatu tɨmba muyɨputak ndahara nandɨ tanda ha mandarahandɨrɨmandɨ, vamba ambami. Harɨm na Gotɨndu Ñɨŋitiŋgata, kumbɨtɨhuta mɨŋgu, vami.
